name: Tumble Tale
description:
Created as part of our final at Fanshawe College, Tumble Tale is a cute puzzle-platformer where you play as a team of animals that roll around to save their children!

Each character has unique properties and can solve puzzles differently.

Can be played with an Xbox controller or Keyboard.

Xbox Controller:

  • Left Stick: Move Character
  • Right Stick: RotateCamera
  • A: Action

Keyboard:

  • WASD: Move Character
  • Q/E: Rotate Camera
  • Space: Action

Created by: 

  • Brock Jolly
  • Jayden Wushke
  • Jean Cuevas
  • Scott Melanson
  • Zack Petropoulakis
